key.name: bing-wallpaper-download
key.summary: Download the BING wallpaper of the day. Queries BING on 12hour interval.

key.name: bing-wallpaper-notify-on-error
key.summary: Notify of error on BING wallpaper of the day download.

key.name: bing-download-directory
key.summary: The directory of the downloaded BING wallpapers.

key.name: bing-wallpapers-downloaded
key.summary: Store the path to each wallpaper downloaded. Used to delete images if bing-wallpaper-delete-old enabled.

key.name: bing-wallpaper-download-count
key.summary: How many BING wallpapers to download.

key.name: bing-wallpaper-resolution
key.summary: Bing Wallpapper image resolution. Valid resolutions: 'UHD', '1920x1200', '1920x1080', '1366x768', '1280x768', '1280x720', '1024x768', '800x600'

key.name: bing-last-data-fetch
key.summary: The JS Date.Now() time of last BING data fetch.

key.name: slideshow-directory
key.summary: The directory of the slideshow wallpapers.

key.name: slideshow-slide-duration
key.summary: Duration of each image in the slideshow (seconds).

key.name: slideshow-use-absolute-time-for-duration
key.summary: Use Absolute Time for Slide Duration.

key.name: slideshow-time-of-slide-start
key.summary: The JS Date.Now() time of when the current slide started. Used when 'slideshow-use-absolute-time-for-duration' enabled.

key.name: slideshow-timer-remaining
key.summary: When (in seconds) to change to the next background image.

key.name: slideshow-wallpaper-queue
key.summary: Permanent storage of the slideshow queue

key.name: slideshow-current-wallpapper
key.summary: The current wallpaper of the slideshow.
